SEARCH
Module comp3111.examsystem
Package comp3111.examsystem.datastore

Class QuestionDetail

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.datastore.BaseDatabaseHandler
comp3111.examsystem.datastore.QuestionDetail
public class QuestionDetail extends BaseDatabaseHandler
Singleton class for managing question details and database operations Handles different types of questions: MCQ single answer, MCQ multi answer, True/False, and Short Questions

      Returns:

    • mapBinaryToLetters

      public static String mapBinaryToLetters(String binaryString)
      Maps a binary string to corresponding ABCD letters
      Parameters:
      binaryString - 4-bit binary string
      Returns:
      String of ABCD letters corresponding to '1' bits
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if binary string is not 4 bits long

    • parseAnswer

      Parameters:
      type - Question type (0: Single, 1: Multiple, 2: True/False, 3: Short)

      Returns:
      Decoded answer string
